# Code Example

Hereâ€™s an example of code and output using **ggplot2** in R.

```{r}
#| output-location: column-fragment
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Miles per Gallon vs. Weight",
    color = "Cylinders"
  )
```
